sentences.sContent: Brown received an honorary doctorate from Seoul University.
sentences.sCn: 布朗获得了首尔大学的荣誉博士学位。

sentences.sContent: ...Why does the author deem it inappropriate for Harvard to confer air honorary degree on Oprah Winfrey...
...Oprah Winfrey's honorary doctorate was a step in the wrong direction...

synos.tran: 荣誉的；名誉的；道义上的

words.tran: 荣誉的；值得尊敬的；表示尊敬的；正直的
尊敬；[金融] 承兑；承兑远期票据

trans.tranOther: an honorary title, rank, or university degree is given to someone as an honour
